bandit_issue_text: Pickle and modules that wrap it can be unsafe when used to deserialize untrusted data, possible security issue.
Use of insecure MD2, MD4, MD5, or SHA1 hash function.
Standard pseudo-random generators are not suitable for security/cryptographic purposes.

pylint_message:
Exactly one space required after comma
        self.client_id = socket.gethostname() + "_" + md5(str(time() + random.randint(0,10000))).hexdigest()
                                                                                       ^
